item.title: Delta Force
item.description:
Title: Delta Force
Genre: Action , Adventure , Massively Multiplayer , Free To Play
Developer: Team Jade
Publisher: TiMi Studio Group
Release Date: Dec 4, 2024




About This Game

Delta Force is back!

The iconic series returns as the definitive free-to-play modern team-based tactical shooter, and featuring four distinct gameplay modes:

- Warfare: battle the enemy across land, sea and air in truly epic 32 v 32 PvP combat, featuring a wide range of vehicles and unique tactical gear.

- Operations: Delta Force meets the next generation extraction shooter as you deploy behind enemy lines with your squad, search for valuables, take on rival players, and extract before it’s too late. Alternatively, our PvE Raid mode offers challenging objective-based missions designed to push your squad to the limit.

- Black Hawk Down: step into the boots of legendary Delta Force operators for this remake of the classic series campaign based on the gripping 2001 movie. Black Hawk Down, coming in January 2025.

We are committed to NO PAY-TO-WIN and development is driven by community feedback. Fair play is a top priority, and our dedicated G.T.I. security anti-cheat team ensures a fair gameplay experience by proactively targeting and removing cheaters.

And remember…

“No-one gets left behind”

Words from the Game Director, Shadow Guo

As a player:

Delta Force was the first shooter I ever played, igniting my passion for the genre. I'm extremely grateful for the opportunity to create Delta Force, and my goal is to share that unforgettable joy with even more players. I hope this new Delta Force game will become the tactical FPS experience I dreamt of all those years ago.

As a Game Director:

We're pushing Unreal Engine to its limits to deliver a truly cross-platform experience that allows players worldwide to immerse themselves in a vivid world of deep characters, explosive destruction, and top-notch action...all worthy of the "Delta Force" name.

Join me in crafting a game for all Delta Force players - Delta Force, a game for us all.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-4150 / AMD FX-6300
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 / AMD R9 380 / Intel Arc A380
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 50 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500x
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 5G / AMD RX5500 XT / Intel Arc A580
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 50 GB available space

item.title: Battle Shapers
item.description:
Title: Battle Shapers
Genre: Action
Developer: Metric Empire
Publisher: Metric Empire , Kepler Ghost
Franchise: Battle Shapers
Release Date: Dec 4, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Oct 3, 2023




About This Game

You play as Ada, a reactivated Shaper tasked with reclaiming New Elysium from the cunning Overlords and their corrupted robots. Using advanced weapons and unique abilities, you will shoot & smash your way through dangerous towers and defeat the Overlords to put an end to their corruption of the city.

  • Gun down hordes of enemy machines with relentless and punishing close-range combat in which every bot destroyed makes you stronger.

  • Face the Overlords and adapt to their evolving powers and tactics by mastering highly customizable weapons, movement, and combat abilities.

  • Steal the Overlords’ Cores and harness their powers to craft and transform both your playstyle and appearance.

  • Unlock new weapons, abilities and talents to permanently increase your survivability and maximize your combat potential with every run.

  • Deploy your own traps, power-ups and hacks in each Overlord’s tower to turn the tides of battle in your favor.

  • Explore vibrant nostalgia-inspired locations to discover hidden upgrades and weapons throughout.

  • Be warned! Just as you grow stronger by defeating Overlords, the journey ahead will also become more challenging.

  • Defy the Overlords and save the city to the might of adrenaline-pumping rock music that will have you diving head-on and fist-first into action.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
    • Processor: i5 4th Gen 4 Cores
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended. 50 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Very Low" preset.
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Version)
    • Processor: i7 7700K
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD recommended. 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Very High" preset.

item.title: Pavlov
item.description:
Title: Pavlov
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: Vankrupt Games
Publisher: Vankrupt Games
Release Date: Dec 4, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Feb 27, 2017




About This Game

Pavlov vr is a multiplayer shooter in VR with heavy focus on community. Set in both modern and WWII era's, you can choose a variety of ways to play the game how you want it.

Features

  • Community hosted dedicated servers.
  • Quick-starting developer hosted lobby system.
  • Search And Destroy, Deathmatch, King of the Hill, and Gun Game game modes.
  • Multi-crew realistically operated tanks
  • Bots.
  • Offline mode.
  • Practice range.
  • Killhouse.
  • Proximity voice chat and radio communication.
  • Custom map support with modkit.
  • Custom game mode support.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Mention of illegal drugs: Marijuana leaf on a few purchasable (Virtual Currency) cosmetics that have not shipped yet but will ship in a future update.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz+
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1070
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
    • Additional Notes: This game uses Easy Anti-cheat
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
    • Processor: Six Core 4 Ghz +
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX 2080
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: This game uses Easy Anti-cheat

item.title: Unknown Tapes
item.description:
Title: Unknown Tapes
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Traviteam Games
Publisher: Traviteam Games
Release Date: Dec 4, 2024




About This Game

About us

As an indie studio made up of two guys video game enthusiasts, we really wanted to play a horror video game with dinosaurs, so we decided to create one ourselves. Any feedback is welcome to help us improve, even for future games that are on the way!

You are the prey

Unknown Tapes is a horror video game that employs the found footage technique to narrate a story focused on survival in a modern setting overrun by dinosaurs. It aims for realism and draws inspiration from Dino Crisis and Outlast .

A story will unfold, with an expected playtime of 2-3 hours from start to finish

You are being hunted by dinosaurs, and you will need to hide, avoid making too much noise, and sometimes use your wits.

Buildings can be destroyed by larger dinosaurs, so you can't always count on finding protection inside.

The game is primarily set at night, featuring both outdoor and indoor environments, some of which may feel claustrophobic.

An Infested Urban World

Thanks to photogrammetry and the graphical power of Unreal Engine 5, we’ve recreated detailed urban environments. Have you ever wondered what it would be like to walk through a town overrun by dinosaurs?

Real-Time Voice Detection

Thanks to the use of the microphone, dinosaurs can hear your voice when you talk or shout in the real world and will react accordingly to what they perceive

Photogrammetry

We used the most advanced photogrammetry software to directly bring real-world objects and environments into the game. Many of the things you see actually exist in the real world

Motion Tracking

Using various software and solutions, we successfully recreated a realistic camera movement by digitizing it and integrating it into the game

Key features

  • First-person narrative walking simulator set in a world full of dinosaurs

  • VHS effect

  • Bodycam effect

  • Blair Witch Project vibes with a tense atmosphere

  • Realistic graphics using photogrammetry

  • Player's voice detected through microphone

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Deadly, brutal, and scary dinosaurs. Blood and gore.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: i5-4440
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB
    • Storage: 12 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: TBD
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or greater
    • Processor: i7 10700
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Radeon RX6800 16 GB
    • Additional Notes: TBD

item.title: The Edge of Allegoria
item.description:
Title: The Edge of Allegoria
Genre: Indie , RPG
Developer: Button Factory Games
Publisher: CobraTekku Games
Release Date: Dec 4, 2024




About This Game


Do you like adventure? Are you a sucker for a world of monsters and magic?
Do you like wholesale violence peppered with coarse language, and served with a side of pixelated booty?
Then buckle up, you legend. We're going for a ride...



Get ready to travel far and wide, taking on creatures of all shapes and sizes in classic turn-based fashion, while discovering the secrets and adventures that Allegoria has in store.
Harvest the body parts of your adversaries for financial gain and personal satisfaction, level up to strike down even greater foes, and arm yourself with more weapons and equipment than any sane person could be reasonably expected to carry on their person at any given time.





There are more than 144 unique enemies to face on your adventures through Allegoria, from ferocious Canadian geese and majestic tortoises to your bog-standard fantasy staples like dragons, unicorns, and the ever-ubiquitous slimes! There are plenty of beasts and beyond to encounter, each with unique item drops that can be sold in shops for the gold you'll need to purchase weapons and equipment to aid you on your journey.





Have you ever played a game that has one weapon you just can't put down, or an armor set that makes you indestructible? It's a great feeling, isn't it?
Too bad that's not the case here.
In Allegoria, if you want to get stronger, you'll need to master as much equipment as you can if you want to increase your stats, and if you think you need new attacks or magic spells to bring with you into battle, you'd better replace that old gear with something new, and fast. With more than 80 skills to learn and almost 150 pieces of equipment to collect, you'll want to try them all to find the right move set for you!





There's no shortage of personality in Allegoria, and everyone seems to have something to say. Most of it's just fluff to fill in empty spaces and make the world seem more lifelike, but every once in a while, someone actually has something useful to say.
They may be a little rough around the edges, but the people of Allegoria are always willing to guide you on your journey, and they might even have a quest or two for you to earn gold and other helpful items.





There's a story in there somewhere... it's just buried under layers of madness and debauchery.
If you think grinding for experience and mastering weapons is tedious, try to unravel this Gordian knot of a narrative.
Does it have a deeper meaning? Absolutely!
Does it matter? No! It's a video game! Just enjoy it and stop worrying about what kind of subliminal messaging the developer is trying to inject into your subconscious...



If you're a fan of retro handheld RPGs with a 2-bit pixel art aesthetic but are tired of the same played-out, stereotypical, fantasy adventure, then be sure to pick up The Edge of Allegoria today for a refreshing take on the genre that influenced a generation!





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Some Nudity and Sexual Content, Pervasive Coarse Language, Alcohol and Drug Use



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 or higher
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 / Intel Core i3
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL compatible
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
